attributes.action: A Kinghthood for another National Treasure Leslie Phillips
attributes.additional_details:
National treasure Leslie Phillips has been gracing our screens for over 70 years and is loved across the world for his iconic roles in the Carry On films and his catchphrases ‘Hello’ and ‘Ding Dong’.

Leslie is an immensely gifted actor with inimitable talent and an instantly recognisable voice, and he is also highly regarded as a character actor with lead roles in feature films including Venus, Empire of the Sun and Tomb Raider. He also won a generation of new fans as the voice of the Sorting Hat in the immensely popular Harry Potter franchise.

Leslie has met and worked with all the luminaries in the business during his 76 year career, from the biggest names in Hollywood to the legends of British stage and screen.
